domini.Basic

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • domini.Basic.Match
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains information about a Match, such as the Player and the current Board
    See Also:
